title: ENS Manager
dapp-desc: Register and manage an ENS domain
search-domain-desc: Search for a domain name. Once you have registered one, you can tell your friends to send ETH to "_____.eth", instead of your public address (0x.....).

error.permanent-not-available: ENS Permanent registrar is not available yet, please try again later
error.domain-tld-not-supported: Domain TLD {parsedTld} is not supported in this node!
error.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again.

warning.contract-not-ready: Contract is not ready yet, transaction might fail.
warning.not-enough-char: Domain name is less than 3 characters.
warning.too-small: File is too small! Size has to be more than 500 bytes.
warning.too-big: File is too big! Size has to be less than 50 megabytes.
warning.text-record-already-exists: Text Record {txtRecord} input is already added for {domainName}

ens-manager.title: ENS Manager
ens-manager.description: Manage your ENS names or transfer it to someone else

no-names-found: No ENS name found for account {address}!
ipfs-processing-description: Please wait for a transaction popup before you leave to make sure your request is processed.
controller-text: Looks like the address you're using is not a controller of {domain}. Do you wanna set {addr} as a controller for {domain}?
hang-on-committing: Please do not close your browser or exit this Dapp, we are creating a commitment for your domain. Timer will start once your transaction is confirmed
finalize-registration: We are finalizing the registration for
domain-old: {domain} is still in the old registrar!
domain-owner: Since you are are the owner of {domain} you can transfer the name to the new registrar using transfer button.

txt.add-txt-type-entry: On your DNS management console, please add a TXT type DNS entry " {txtString} " with a value containing your Ethereum address in the format of "a=YOURETHEREUMADDRESS"
txt.name-owned: This name is currently owned in ENS by {owner} but TXT record is no longer available for {domain}!
txt.unclaim-desc: You can unclaim this {domain} from ENS by clicking the following button

commit.how-many-years: How many years do you want to keep the name?
commit.no-balance: You have no balance to send a Tx

ens-resolver.address-reported-error: Address has been reported. Please make sure you are sending funds to the correct address.
ens-resolver.addr-not-checksummed: This address is not checksummed properly. Please copy the address exactly as shown.
ens-resolver.network-not-found: {network}NS name is invalid or not found
ens-resolver.domain-not-found: Domain name is invalid or not found

unstoppableResolution.address-reported-error: Address has been reported. Please make sure you are sending funds to the correct address.
unstoppableResolution.UnspecifiedCurrency: Domain {domain} has no {currencyTicker} attached to it
unstoppableResolution.NamingServiceDown: {method} naming service is down at the moment
unstoppableResolution.IncorrectResolverInterface: Domain resolver is configured incorrectly for {method}

request.about-domain: Once you have a domain name, you can tell your friends to send ETH to your domain name instead of your address.

register.name: Register
register.complete-reg-desc: Please click 'Register' and follow the prompts to complete a final transaction and complete your domain registration.

manage-domains.what-to-do: What do you want to do with this domain?
